abstract.p: Television home-improvement show host Tim Allen sells tools and toys through his Web site; photo (S)

block.p: TIM ALLEN, (www.timallentools.com) Actor and author supports chil dren's charities

Tim Allen is best known for his long-running television series ''Home Improvement,'' where he played the host of a home-improvement TV show. Mr. Allen has his own line of home-improvement products called Tim Allen Signature Tools and a children's line called Tim Allen Signature Toys. Both are available at the Web

site. The profits from the Signature Toys are donated to children's educational and charitable causes, like Big Brothers-Big Sisters, the Salvation Army, Regal Aid Clinic, Target House and Harbor Light.

Tim Allen is best known for his long-running television series ''Home Improvement,'' where he played the host of a home-improvement TV show. Mr. Allen has his own line of home-improvement products called Tim Allen Signature Tools and a children's line called Tim Allen Signature Toys. Both are available at the Web

site. The profits from the Signature Toys are donated to children's educational and charitable causes, like Big Brothers-Big Sisters, the Salvation Army, Regal Aid Clinic, Target House and Harbor Light.
Signature Toys offers kits like treasure chests and birdhouses, which parents and children can build together. A new series of holiday ornament kits will join the lineup.

Most sales of the Signature lines have been generated through traditional retail outlets, said Rob Cowin, the president of Signature Tools. He also said they were reorganizing and would have a new Web site by the end of the year. ''Our goal is to channel more sales activity through the Web site while maintaining direct contact support,'' Mr. Cowin said.
